---
title: "Statistical Test Selection Table"
format:
  pdf:
    keep-tex: false
geometry: landscape
header-includes:
  - \usepackage{booktabs}
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

library(readr)
library(kableExtra)

data_wide_read <- read_csv2("test_selection_scheme_wide.csv")

data_wide_read[is.na(data_wide_read)] <- ""

data_wide_read |>
  kbl(format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE) |>
  kable_styling(
    latex_options = c("striped", "scale_down", "hold_position"),
    stripe_color = "gray!15"
  )
```
